_header: All our mischiefs have in Thy sight
_description: A prayer to the Virgin — 45 lines in couplets

BLEge3245.First Lines: Alle owr mischeuis haue in þy syhtIn flesch frel we ben be lokin…
BLEge3245.Last Lines: …hem to resceyue þat þow wiltAnd helpe þat I be nouht spilt
BLEge3245.Note: Begins without heading at top of leaf, with incomplete couplet, so begins imperfectly.
BLEge3245.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “The Gurney Series of Religious Lyrics.” 
             PMLA
         54 (1939): 369-90: 385-6.
